address: Xã Sơn Tây, Huyện Hương Sơn, Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Sơn Tây, Huyện Hương Sơn, Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh"**

Okay, so I've been asked to find the new administrative unit for "Xã Sơn Tây" in Hà Tĩnh province. First things first, I identified the province as "Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh."  My understanding is that I need to check if there have been any mergers or changes to administrative divisions. The initial check of provincial resolutions showed that Hà Tĩnh, as a province, was not subject to any merger.

Next, I needed to delve into the specific changes at the ward level. I zeroed in on Resolution 1665/NQ-UBTVQH15, "Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Hà Tĩnh."  This resolution would have the details I'm after.  I started scanning the relevant lines, specifically looking for any mention of "Xã Sơn Tây."

I came across two lines of interest. The first didn't explicitly mention my ward, just the district it was in, so I discarded it. Then, bingo! Line 43 of the resolution was a perfect match. It states that "thị trấn Tây Sơn" and "xã Sơn Tây" are merging to create a *new* ward also named "xã Sơn Tây."  This is exactly what I needed.

My next step was to verify this finding. I checked the "New wards" list provided, looking for "Xã Sơn Tây" in Hà Tĩnh. There it was: `{"ward_code":"18172","ward_name":"Xã Sơn Tây","province_name":"Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh"}`.  The match was perfect.

Based on this, I'm confident in my conclusion. The new ward remains "Xã Sơn Tây" in "Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh", and the `ward_code` is "18172". My final output will reflect this information, citing Resolution 1665/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically line 43, with a "high" confidence level because of the clear and direct merger statement.

citation.header: 1665/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Hà Tĩnh
citation.line: 43. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Tây Sơn và xã Sơn Tây thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Sơn Tây**.
